mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(boardSeq, boardCategory, boardTitle, userSeq, boardContent, boardDate, boardcnt) values ((select nvl(max(boardseq), 0) + 1 from board), #{boardCategory}, #{boardTitle}, #{userSeq}, #{boardContent}, SYSDATE, 0)

INSERT INTO adopt(boardSeq, adoptImg, adoptSex, adoptRescueDate, adoptAge, adoptAddr, adoptWeight, adoptNeutor, adoptState, adoptKind) VALUES ((select max(boardseq) from BOARD), #{adoptImg}, #{adoptSex}, #{adoptRescueDate}, #{adoptAge}, #{adoptAddr}, #{adoptWeight}, #{adoptNeutor, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adoptState}, #{adoptKind})
mapper.select: select username, userid, board.boardSeq, board.boardCategory, board.boardTitle, board.userSeq, board.boardContent, board.boardDate, adopt.adoptImg, adopt.adoptSex, adopt.adoptRescueDate, adopt.adoptAge, adopt.adoptAddr, adopt.adoptWeight, adopt.adoptNeutor, adopt.adoptState, adopt.adoptKind, board.boardCnt from board, adopt, users where board.boardseq = adopt.boardseq and board.userseq = users.userseq and board.boardseq = #{boardSeq} order by adopt.boardseq DESC

SELECT board.boardseq, board.boardtitle, board.boardCategory, adopt.adoptimg, adopt.adoptkind, adopt.adoptaddr, adopt.adoptstate FROM board, adopt WHERE board.boardseq = adopt.boardseq ORDER BY BOARDSEQ DESC

select count(*) from board, adopt where 1=1 and board.boardseq = adopt.boardseq
and boardTitle like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
